## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security issue, please **do not open a public issue**.  
Instead, contact the maintainer privately at:

ğŸ“§ **Email:** bodyast1010@gmail.com  
ğŸ”’ Or open a [GitHub security advisory](https://github.com/bodyast/logManager/security/advisories)

All vulnerabilities will be taken seriously and addressed promptly.
